name: Kerri's Concoction Sweet Snack Mix
author: Kerri Tolbert
summary: People ask me when I am going to make more of this sweet snack mix that is so simple. Kids love it. White chocolate, (any plain) cereals, nuts, pretzels, dried cranberries, and spices. You can use whatever dried fruit or plain cereals you prefer.
ingredients: 4 cups toasted oat cereal (such as Cheerios®)
4 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Melt butter in large roasting pan over medium heat
Stir brown sugar, cinnamon, ginger, and nutmeg into the melted butter
Add toasted oat cereal, shredded wheat biscuits, rice cereal squares, pretzels, and nuts; stir to coat with the butter mixture
Bake in preheated oven, stirring every 15 minutes, for 1 hour
Set aside to cool; transfer to a large bowl
Fold white chocolate morsels and dried cranberries through the cereal mixture; spread onto a large sheet of waxed paper to cool completely
